Description: Lip and wall sherd (mended from four fragments) of North Ionian pottery plate; sofa rim and flat base with grooving; fine orange clay with much silver mica; cream slip; exterior: bands at top and bottom of wall, and over grooving on underside; interior: on lip, maeander band; band at join of rim and floor with added red band superimposed; zig-zag band and band with added red around periphery of floor; dotted exergue line with foot of human to right; trace of object in exergue.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.918)
